nodes.text: The NK-Witell-class freighter was a freighter class built by Sanhar-Witell which entered common service roughly 13 years after the Battle of Endor. Seventeen years later, an estimated 137,417 NK-Witell-class freighters were still in use throughout the galaxy's trade lanes. One such freighter, the Yissira Zyde, was hijacked by the First Order in the Mirrin sector.
The NK-Witell-class freighter first appeared in Before the Awakening, a junior novel written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
